section.name: Roadmap for Hippo ECM Concepts

subsection.name: Support for WebDAV browsers
subsection.p: Currently, any jcr browser can navigate through Hippo Repository. A WebDAV compatible view will be added.

subsection.name: Search Query GUI in CMS
subsection.p: Creating searches won't need XPATH or SQL skills, but will be created through a CMS GUI in which you click together some search criteria, including preview of the results.

subsection.name: GUI for creating a facetted navigation
subsection.p:
Currently, when creating a facetted navigation, you have to provide a UUID from the physical node that indicates the 'root' of the content, and add facets, like [hippo:author, hippo:year, hippo:location].
Instead of having to know all properties, a GUI helping you where you can drag drop the properties you want facetted navigation on will be provided in short notice.

subsection.name: GUI for creating a facet select

section.subsection:
Just like for facetted navigation, you need to know some properties that are on nodes to build a proper facet select. For example, when you only want published documents, you need to add a 'hippostd:state' to the hippo:facets property and add 'published' to the hippo:values property.
Obviously, instead of typing, a graphical view show you available properties and possible values will be added as a default Hippo CMS plugin.
